name: RVMX Arcade Game
description:
Have fun with our 5 different arcade games (Bowling, Basketball, Alien Shoot, and more). Each game saves your points and has a time limit. You can play it with your friends or family and as many times as you want.

Download for free and leave us your comments to improve our game or feel free to contact us at inforvmx@gmail.com

Also, check out our new PC VR game Tako Loko VR at https://sidequestvr.com/app/1699/tako-loko-vr-alpha-101
